name: Quicken 2017 Data File
summary: Learn about .QUICKEN2017 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The QUICKEN2017 file is saved in a proprietary format and the file should not be modified or moved after creation. It is saved in the following location by default:
You can export your account information to the .QXF file format. Select File → Export from the menu and save the information in a QXF file.
You can also save a backup of the data in a QUICKEN2017 file as a .QUICKEN2017BACKUP file. This is helpful for securing data in case the QUICKEN2017 file becomes corrupt or is lost.

description: A QUICKEN2017 file is a financial data file created by the 2017 version of Quicken for Mac, a financial management program. It contains user data for several accounts, including personal information, transactions, reports, and settings. QUICKEN2017 files were introduced in the 2017 version of Quicken and are used exclusively by the software.
